home.title: CDUC Portal
home.description: A portal that integrates the modules of the Cosmos product — ECAPP, ECCom, eClient, ECWT, and Showback — bringing together dashboards, reports, manuals, and strategic information in a single environment. The platform supports decision-making at the managerial and operational levels, facilitating access, analysis, and visualization of essential data.
home.footer: 4Bears Informática - Brasília-DF, Brazil. All rights reserved.
